title: Introduction to Sounds
content: Children are introduced to clapping, drumming, singing, and humming. Music helps them listen and keep rhythm.

title: Fun Nursery Rhymes
content: Rhymes make learning fun and help children remember words easily.

title: Singing Games
content: Children sing while playing simple circle or clap games to learn teamwork.

title: Simple Instruments
content: Pupils use rattles, tambourines, and sticks to make sounds and play rhythms.

title: Action Rhymes
content: Children act out rhymes with movements, which helps them build confidence and memory.
examples: Head, Shoulders, Knees, and Toes ğŸ‘¤

title: Listening Songs
content: Short songs encourage careful listening and repeating sounds or words.

title: Learning About Today
content: Pupils notice weather, days of the week, and national symbols.

title: Days of the Week
content: Children learn to name and sing the days of the week in order.

title: Weather Changes
content: Pupils observe the weather: sunny, rainy, cloudy, windy.

title: Our Community
content: Children are introduced to helpers: doctors, teachers, police officers, and farmers.
